means: 异性恋，异性性欲，异性性行为

word_mean: 异性性欲，异性恋：区别于同性恋(homosexuality)

sentence.Network_en: If heterosexuality is normal, why are so many mental patients heterosexual?
sentence.Network_cn: 如果异性恋正常, 为什么如此多的精神病人是异性恋者?

sentence.Network_en: If heterosexuality is normal, why a disproportionate number of mental patients heterosexual?
sentence.Network_cn: 假如异性恋倾向才是正常, 为什麽又有这麽多的精神病患是异性恋 呢 ?

sentence.Network_en: Heterosexuality is the natural norm, bisexuality and homosexuality must be suppressed.
sentence.Network_cn: 异性恋是自然的准则, 双性恋和同性恋必须受到压制.

entry.def: A heterosexual relationship is a sexual relationship between a man and a woman.
Someone who is heterosexual is sexually attracted to people of the opposite sex.

means.word_mean: 1. a sexual attraction to (or sexual relations with) persons of the opposite sex
